alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 2:04PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Collier, eastern Hendry, northern Broward and Palm Beach Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 204 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a funnel cloud along a line extending from near Loxahatchee NWR to near Big Cypress Seminole Reservation. Movement was northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Belle Glade, Clewiston, Pahokee, South Bay, Lake Harbor, Montura, Okeelanta, Loxahatchee NWR, Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, Belle Glade Camp, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, Devils Garden, Lion Country Safari Park, Fremd Village-Padgett Island and Harlem. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
